basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli D21 (MIC=0.3 µM), Enterobacter cloacae β12 (MIC=0.4 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa OT97 (MIC=2.2 µM), Serratia marcescens Db11 (MIC=93 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megatherium Bm11 (MIC=2.6 µM), Bacillus subtilis Bsll (MIC=16 µM), Micrococcus luteus MI11 (MIC=8.5 µM).
